channel.title: Tools on Brain Baking
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Brain Baking

item.title: resharper
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: ReSharper Documentatie: ​Default keymap PDF overview​ IntelliJ keymap PDF overview​ Shortcut ref VS Eclipse | Eclipse shortcut | ReSharper shortcut | description | CTRL+D | CTRL+L | remove line | ALT+DOWN | CTRL+D | duplicate line | CTRL+SPACE (CTRL+ENTER) | CTRL+SPACE (TAB) | code completion, select in combobox | ALT+SHIFT+UP/DOWN | CTRL+ALT+LEFT/RIGHT | Extend/Shrink selection | CTRL+SHIFT+/ | CTRL+ALT+/ | commend line | CTRL+SHIFT+1 | ALT+ENTER | quick fix | ALT+UP/DOWN | CTRL+SHIFT+ALT+UP/DOWN | move line | CTRL+SHIFT+O | CTRL+E, ©/F | organize imports (and format etc, F = silent) | CTRL+F11 | CTRL+U, U | rerun last | CTRL+O | ALT+ | Go to file member | CTRL+SHIFT+G | CTRL+SHIFT+ALT+F12 (SHIFT+F12) | find usages | F3 | F12 | go to definition | CTRL+SHIFT+.

item.title: sublime
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Sublime Text protips Handige links Keyb shortcuts voor mac: http://docs.sublimetext.info/en/latest/reference/keyboard_shortcuts_osx.html Tips voor python devs ea: http://opensourcehacker.com/2012/05/11/sublime-text-2-tips-for-python-and-web-developers/ Must-have plugins Installeren via Sublime Package Control SublimeLinter - linting in verschillende talen (ook CoffeeScript) SublimeCodeIntel - autocompletion in verschillende talen. Werkt zoals in eclipse, gebruik ctrl+shift+space voor box te triggeren. git jsFormat (mapt by default op cmd+alt+F, heb het remapped naar eclipse equiv. cmd+shift+F) FilterLines om door logging te ploegen - greplike in subl.

item.title: visualstudio
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Visual Studio Handige plugins http://www.codemaid.net/ - auto-cleanup on save, integratie resharper code/tools/resharper Debugging PDB files auto-resolven: remote SymbolSource enablen Zie Using SymbolSource Go to Tools -> Options -> Debugger -> General. Uncheck “Enable Just My Code (Managed only)”. Uncheck “Enable .NET Framework source stepping”. Yes, it is misleading, but if you don’t, then Visual Studio will ignore your custom server order (see further on) and only use it’s own servers.

item.title: tfs
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)

item.title: eclipse
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Eclipse tips & tricks Shortcuts die ik nog niet vanbuiten ken CTRL+(SHIFT)+E: view open editors & quickfind!! CTRL+M: minimize/maximize editor CTRL+ F6: switch editor F7: switch view F8: switch perspective CTRL+ALT+ R: run server D: debug server CTLR+SHIFT+NUMPAD/: minimize all trees in package explorer (handig bij link with editor) Custom preferences Static imports CTRL+3, “favorites” (Java/Editor/Context assist) -> New Type. Zeker handig voor Assertions van FEST Assert.

item.title: git
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Git Handige commando’s Van een remote branch changes binnen halen Stel: ik heb een fork gemaakt maar wil van de “upstream” de veranderingen binnen halen: git remote add upstream git://github.com/user/bla.git git fetch upstream git merge upstream/master En dan eventueel merge conflicten oplossen. Stap-voor-stap setup git voor windows: volg instructies op http://help.github.com/win-set-up-git/ Stap-voor-stap SSH Installeer cygwin met de volgende packages: ssh en varianten git corkscrew voor proxy indien nodig genereer voor uw pc public ssh keys met ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "[email]" Kopieer de public key in ~/.

item.title: hacking
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: code:tools >> Hacking HTTP streams monitoren etc Op Windows: http://www.fiddler2.com/fiddler2/version.asp Voor Firefox: “Poster” plugin Unlocking stuf “Unlocker” werkt blijkbaar niet op windows 7 - dit wel: http://lockhunter.com/

item.title: intellij
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: IntelliJ voor Eclipse users Shortcuts Eclipse VS IntelliJ Keyboard shortcuts Shortcuts google docs van Janick IntelliJ Q&A for Eclipse users -> IntelliJ and Eclipse shortcuts meest interessante? ❗️ Eclipse to IntelliJ shortcut plugin voor IntelliJ: http://plugins.intellij.net/plugin/?idea&id=6827 Source hier beschikbaar: https://github.com/janickr/shortcuttranslator De meest voorkomende shortcuts vergelijken | Betekenis | Eclipse shortcut | IntelliJ shortcut | | Open Type | CTRL+SHIFT+T | CTRL+N | | Close Editor | CTRL+W | CTRL+F4 | | Delete line | CTRL+D | CTRL+Y |
